events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer role. The resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and developer experience noted in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to follow up with the candidate for the next steps in the interview process.
Initial phone screening with the candidate went well, discussing their experience with software development and devops, confirming fit for the position.
The candidate responded positively to the invitation for a technical interview and provided available time slots for scheduling.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
